name: ShotBacK (Sharan Uday Kumar)
description:
Game Name:- ShotBack 

 This is the Bullet-hell shooter, I have made for the 3 day Game Jam (for Jame Gam) with the theme of "You are the enemy"  

The focus is scoring the highest points and points are accumulated depending on the type of enemy you take down  

Purple-Blue-Green-Yellow-White is the difficulty of the enemy from hardest to easiest and the points are given accordingly 

The bullets you shoot, shoot back at you in a delay ( tying into the theme )  

Score is accumalated based on how many enemies (infinitely spawned) you eliminate  

Any bullet that hits an enemy (even their own allies or from the reflected bullets , hurt your enemy so plan your strategy accordingly  

Controls:-  

W-Forward 

A-Left 

S-Back 

D-Right  

Space-Shoot  

All music used are from freesound.org (will be linking the same here)
